SEARCH
Package skip

Class Query

java.lang.Object
skip.Query
public final class Query extends Object
This class contains the implementation of algorithms for event searching. In particular, as detailed in our work, we focused on type F queries, i.e., when users are interested in computing the first occurrence of an event. Two methods have been implemented in this regard:
  1. the sequential method, which iterates through all the blocks within the range until the desired key is found;
  2. the BF skip index-based method, which leverages these data structures to speed up the search.

  • Field Details

    • containsDefault

      public static final BiPredicate<BloomFilter,Event> containsDefault
      Membership testing procedure for standard Bloom filters. An event is included in a block if and only if the keys of the block contain both the contract address and the event signature digest.

    • containsExtended

      public static final BiPredicate<BloomFilter,Event> containsExtended
      Membership testing procedure for extended Bloom filters. An event is included in a block if and only if the keys of the block contain the concatenation of the contract address and the event signature digest.

  • Method Details

    • linearSearch

      public static QueryResult linearSearch(ChainIndex index, ChainStorage storage, int lower, int upper, Event e, BiPredicate<BloomFilter,Event> membership) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Implementation of the sequential search algorithm.
      Parameters:
      index - chain index database
      storage - chain storage database
      lower - lower endpoint of the search interval
      upper - upper endpoint of the search interval
      e - event to be searched
      membership - predicate for Bloom filter membership testing
      Returns:
      a QueryResult with information about the result of the query
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of deserialization errors
      ClassNotFoundException - in case of deserialization errors

    • findFirst

      public static QueryResult findFirst(ChainIndex index, ChainStorage storage, int lower, int upper, Event e, BiPredicate<BloomFilter,Event> membership) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Implementation of the efficient search algorithm based on BF skip indexes.
      Parameters:
      index - chain index database
      storage - chain storage database
      lower - lower endpoint of the search range
      upper - upper endpoint of the search range
      e - event to be searched
      membership - predicate for checking event membership within Bloom filters
      Returns:
      a QueryResult with information about the result of the query
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of deserialization errors
      ClassNotFoundException - in case of deserialization errors

    • maxJump

      public static int maxJump(int numEntries, int lower, int upper)
      Auxiliary method for computing the maximum feasible jump.
      Parameters:
      numEntries - number of entries in the current skip list
      lower - lower bound for the search range
      upper - upper bound for the search range (i.e., current block)
      Returns:
      identifier of the maximum feasible jump, -1 if no jump can be selected
